name: Unepic - OST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows XP
  • Processor:Dual Core
  • Memory:4 GB GB RAM
  • Graphics:256mb, Compatible with OpenGL
  • DirectX®:7.0
  • Hard Drive:256mb disk space
  • Sound:Direct Sound installed
NOTE: Some ATI graphics cards require troubleshooting because their drivers are not 100% compatible with OpenGL. If you have concerns, try running the demo first.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recomended:
  • OS *:Windows XP or later
  • Processor:Quad Core
  • Memory:8GB
  • Graphics:Nvidia Geforce 512GB or more
  • DirectX®:7.0 or later
  • Hard Drive:256mb disk space
  • Sound:Direct Sound installed
NOTE: Some ATI graphics cards require troubleshooting because their drivers are not 100% compatible with OpenGL. If you have concerns, try running the demo first.

supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Korean, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Russian, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Dutch
*languages with full audio support
